courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Must be a student in the LER program.
description: Full or part-time practice of human resources or employment relations in an off-campus government, corporate or not-for-profit environment. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Must be a student in the LER program.
label: Internship
